content: **upd** overlay mosaic crochet files are available for free for members of my facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/345702437625205 technic double filet crochet interlocking filet crochet type blanket / afghan gauge 5 windows by 5 windows in 5 cm as long as your windows are square using a different gauge won t affect the design but it will change the finish size and the amount of yarn needed hook size 4 5 mm hook size needed to match the gauge approximate yardage 4000 meters of yarn for each of your two colors which is a total of 8000 meters of yarn 4375 yards per colors a total of 8750 yards of yarn 18-19 skeins 3 5 oz for each colors size 150 cm wide and 210 cm long 150 x 210 windows the pattern contains a graph and right-handed instructions
